analysis.description:
TrivialToken.finishIco (/unique_chucks/12/0x55fc04a73f058832b4f3498dc83ceb6e53a9e314.sol#350-374) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! artist.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0x55fc04a73f058832b4f3498dc83ceb6e53a9e314.sol#371-373)
